text: The cat chased the mouse.
The mouse was chased by the cat.
She wrote a letter.
A letter was written by her.
The chef cooked the meal.
The meal was cooked by the chef.
The team won the match.
The match was won by the team.
He painted the house.
The house was painted by him.
They cleaned the park.
The park was cleaned by them.
The company launched a new product.
A new product was launched by the company.
The dog bit the man.
The man was bitten by the dog.
She read the book.
The book was read by her.
The students completed the project.
The project was completed by the students.
